meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Repay</kanji> people for the <kanji>news</kanji> they tell you by <vocabulary>reward</vocabulary>ing them! Everyone deserves <vocabulary>compensation</vocabulary> for the time they take to pass information to you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
